channel.title: Seeing Purple
channel.description:
I ran this game on my laptop and had absolutely no problems but only my PC i keep seeing purple on objects that aren't supposed to be purple. At first I thought it was just that exit sign in the beginning but it's everywhere. I have everything on max settings, I tried running it in direct x 9 and 9.8 and I even uninstalled it, redownloaded it and reinstalled it. Can someone help me out?
AMD FX(tm)-8320 Eight-Core Processor Radeon 260x 8 gigs of Ram
PS: I tried to take a screenshot of it using F12 but it looks fine in the screen shot. So I tried to print screen it but it just pasted a dark screen into Paint. So then I tried to get smart and turn it into a window and print screen it but apparently it's not a problem in windowed mode, just full screen.

item.title: Seeing Purple
item.dc:creator: blackredx
item.description:
I ran this game on my laptop and had absolutely no problems but only my PC i keep seeing purple on objects that aren’t supposed to be purple. At first I thought it was just that exit sign in the beginning but it’s everywhere. I have everything on max settings, I tried running it in direct x 9 and 9.8 and I even uninstalled it, redownloaded it and reinstalled it. Can someone help me out?

AMD FX™-8320 Eight-Core Processor
Radeon 260x
8 gigs of Ram

PS: I tried to take a screenshot of it using F12 but it looks fine in the screen shot. So I tried to print screen it but it just pasted a dark screen into Paint. So then I tried to get smart and turn it into a window and print screen it but apparently it’s not a problem in windowed mode, just full screen.
